siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: The 2024-25 NFL season has showcased an inury-riddled and action-packed journey for all the teams so far, all of whom are actively trying to make it to the postseason. Two sides who have yet to find a consistent stretch of form and will be clashing today are the Miami Dolphins and the San Francisco 49ers. Find out how and when you can view the game between the Dolphins and the 49ers live below. Where can you watch the Miami Dolphins vs San Francisco 49ers game today? You can watch Miami Dolphins vs San Francisco 49ers today via Hulu, FuboTV, Paramount Plus, NFL+, and CBS channels in select regions. The fixture will be televised on CBS’ local stations in a select range of regions. On the sdigital front, fans can watch today’s game through NFL+, the league’s premier streaming platform, FuboTV, Hulu, and Paramount Plus. What time does the game start? Miami Dolphins vs San Francisco 49ers takes place at 4:25 PM ET and 1:25 PM PT on December 22. The Miami Dolphins have bounced back from a woeful start, securing a decent four wins in their last six games. As such, they currently sit in second place in the AFC East division, with a 6-8 record. The San Francisco 49ers have managed a similar record so far, but have done so by registering a meager two wins in their last six bouts. How to watch & stream Miami Dolphins vs San Francisco 49ers for free? You can watch Miami Dolphins vs San Francisco 49ers for free via Hulu, Paramount Plus, and FuboTV. Hulu allows its new users to opt for a 30-day free trial before they are required to pay the standard subscription rates. Meanwhile, Paramount Plus and FuboTV provide a similar offer, just for 7 days. Predictions On paper, there is little to separate the two sides. Both Miami and San Francisco have struggled to muster a decent amount of yards in their recent games, limiting their offensive oppourtinities. While the 49ers have ensured their defensive output lately, conceding a combined 25 points in their last two games, it would be interesting to see if they can contain a resurgent Dolphins attack. In this evenly-matched contest, it is tough to predict a clear winner. However, if Miami can keep a check on their mistakes, they should be able to best their rivals today.
html:
The 2024-25 NFL season has showcased an inury-riddled and action-packed journey for all the teams so far, all of whom are actively trying to make it to the postseason. Two sides who have yet to find a consistent stretch of form and will be clashing today are the Miami Dolphins and the San Francisco 49ers.

Find out how and when you can view the game between the Dolphins and the 49ers live below.

Where can you watch the Miami Dolphins vs San Francisco 49ers game today?

You can watch Miami Dolphins vs San Francisco 49ers today via Hulu, FuboTV, Paramount Plus, NFL+, and CBS channels in select regions.

The fixture will be televised on CBS’ local stations in a select range of regions. On the sdigital front, fans can watch today’s game through NFL+, the league’s premier streaming platform, FuboTV, Hulu, and Paramount Plus.

What time does the game start?

Miami Dolphins vs San Francisco 49ers takes place at 4:25 PM ET and 1:25 PM PT on December 22.

The Miami Dolphins have bounced back from a woeful start, securing a decent four wins in their last six games. As such, they currently sit in second place in the AFC East division, with a 6-8 record. The San Francisco 49ers have managed a similar record so far, but have done so by registering a meager two wins in their last six bouts.

How to watch & stream Miami Dolphins vs San Francisco 49ers for free?

You can watch Miami Dolphins vs San Francisco 49ers for free via Hulu, Paramount Plus, and FuboTV.

Hulu allows its new users to opt for a 30-day free trial before they are required to pay the standard subscription rates. Meanwhile, Paramount Plus and FuboTV provide a similar offer, just for 7 days.

Predictions

On paper, there is little to separate the two sides. Both Miami and San Francisco have struggled to muster a decent amount of yards in their recent games, limiting their offensive oppourtinities. While the 49ers have ensured their defensive output lately, conceding a combined 25 points in their last two games, it would be interesting to see if they can contain a resurgent Dolphins attack. In this evenly-matched contest, it is tough to predict a clear winner. However, if Miami can keep a check on their mistakes, they should be able to best their rivals today.
